abstract: The Primerica life insurance company had been one of the pillars used by Sanford I. Weill to build a global financial colossus.
snippet: The Primerica life insurance company had been one of the pillars used by Sanford I. Weill to build a global financial colossus.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup‘s longstanding relationship with the life insurance company Primerica is coming to an end, as the bank prepares to sell the last of its remaining shares in the firm it took public last year.

headline.main: Citigroup to Sell Last of Its Stake in Primerica
